title: Women's Rights National Historical Park: Underground Railroad and Erie Canal
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories     The First Women's Rights Convention     Underground Railroad and Erie Canal                  Underground Railroad and Erie Canal         Seneca Knitting Mill in Seneca Falls, along the Cayuga Seneca Canal, Erie Canalway National Heritage Cooridor NPS  The Erie Canalway National Heritage Cooridor and the Network to Freedom Underground Railroad have collaborated on a New York State Undergound Railroad Network to Freedom Map.  For sites, programs, and tours that have been included on the map, view the map here! All are publically accessible and visitor ready.
